text: Pepin the Hunchback (, , c. 767 - 811) was a prince of Frankish Empire. He was the first son of Charlemagne and grandson of Pepin the Short. ==Related pages== * Charlemagne * Frankish Empire * Louis the Pious Category:760s births Category:811 deaths Category:Holy Roman Emperors Category:Frankish kings
title: Pepin the Hunchback
